attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I feel that this country needs bringing into (a) the real world (b) a good shake up (c)they all need to take a VERY large pay cut. As they all waste the hard working tax payers money. 
Iam only young and iam so sick of this country and already want to leave!!
Get rid of LABOUR bring back
Enoch Powell

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
